001package ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.protocol.http.legacy;
002
003/**
004 * Legacy entry point for the retired HTTP assembler pipeline.
005 * <p>This stub throws to guard deployments that still reference the pre-0.1 assembler wiring.</p>
006 * <p>Replace invocations with the modern pipeline, for example:</p>
007 * <pre>{@code
008 * PosterUseCase poster = new PosterUseCase();
009 * poster.run(posterConfig);
010 * }</pre>
011 *
012 * @deprecated since RADAR 0.1.0; scheduled for removal in RADAR 0.2.0. Use
013 *     {@link ca.gc.cra.radar.application.pipeline.PosterUseCase} or the protocol-specific
014 *     {@link ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.poster.PosterPipeline} implementations instead.
015 */
016@Deprecated(since = "0.1.0", forRemoval = true)
017public final class LegacyHttpAssembler {
018  /**
019   * Retained only for binary compatibility; always throws
020   * {@link UnsupportedOperationException}.
021   *
022   * @param timestampMicros capture timestamp in microseconds
023   * @param src source IP address
024   * @param srcPort source TCP port
025   * @param dst destination IP address
026   * @param dstPort destination TCP port
027   * @param sequence TCP sequence number
028   * @param fromClient {@code true} when the segment originated from the client
029   * @param payload TCP payload bytes
030   * @param offset payload offset within the array
031   * @param length number of bytes provided in {@code payload}
032   * @param fin whether the FIN flag was set
033   * @throws UnsupportedOperationException always thrown to signal unsupported usage
034   * @deprecated since RADAR 0.1.0; invoke the current assemble/poster pipeline instead
035   */
036  public void onTcpSegment(
037      long timestampMicros,
038      String src,
039      int srcPort,
040      String dst,
041      int dstPort,
042      long sequence,
043      boolean fromClient,
044      byte[] payload,
045      int offset,
046      int length,
047      boolean fin) {
048    throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Legacy assembler is not supported; use the new pipeline");
049  }
050}
051
052
